data.question: How does the introduction of 2,6-diaminopurine in place of adenine affect the optical properties of ZnFDCA?

data.question: How does the crystal structure of ZnFDCA differ from that of ZnFDCA-NH2?
data.answer: ZnFDCA crystallizes in the I4̅m2 space group showing chiroptical activity, while ZnFDCA-NH2 crystallizes in an orthorhombic space group Pccn, losing its chiroptical activity due to a different packing pattern.

data.question: What role does the tetrahedral distortion play in the nonlinear optical activity of ZnFDCA?
data.answer: The tetrahedral distortion increases the asymmetry of the whole framework, contributing to the nonlinear optical activity of ZnFDCA.

data.question: What experimental techniques were used to characterize the chiroptical and nonlinear optical properties of ZnFDCA?
data.answer: Circular dichroism (CD) spectra and second harmonic generation (SHG) efficiency measurements were used to characterize the chiroptical and nonlinear optical properties of ZnFDCA.
